channel.title: CVE Feed for Antenna House -- Antenna House
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Antenna House -- Antenna House

item.title: CVE-2018-3936|2024-08-05T04:57:24.500Z -- antenna%20house -- antenna%20house
item.description: In Antenna House Office Server Document Converter version V6.1 Pro MR2 for Linux64 (6,1,2018,0312), a crafted Microsoft Word (DOC) document can lead to an out-of-bounds write, resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-3931|2024-08-05T04:57:24.401Z -- antenna%20house -- antenna%20house
item.description: In Antenna House Office Server Document Converter version V6.1 Pro MR2 for Linux64 (6,1,2018,0312), a crafted Microsoft Word (DOC) document can lead to an out-of-bounds write, resulting in remote code execution. This vulnerability occurs in the `putShapeProperty` method.

item.title: CVE-2018-3929|2024-08-05T04:57:24.474Z -- antenna%20house -- antenna%20house
item.description: An exploitable heap corruption exists in the PowerPoint document conversion functionality of the Antenna House Office Server Document Converter version V6.1 Pro MR2 for Linux64 (6,1,2018,0312). A crafted PowerPoint (PPT) document can lead to heap corruption, resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-3932|2024-08-05T04:57:24.465Z -- antenna%20house -- antenna%20house
item.description: An exploitable stack-based buffer overflow exists in the Microsoft Word document conversion functionality of the Antenna House Office Server Document Converter version V6.1 Pro MR2 for Linux64 (6,1,2018,0312). A crafted Microsoft Word (DOC) document can lead to a stack-based buffer overflow, resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-3930|2024-08-05T04:57:24.448Z -- antenna%20house -- antenna%20house
item.description: In Antenna House Office Server Document Converter version V6.1 Pro MR2 for Linux64 (6,1,2018,0312), a crafted Microsoft Word (DOC) document can lead to an out-of-bounds write, resulting in remote code execution. This vulnerability occurs in the `vbgetfp` method.

item.title: CVE-2018-3933|2024-08-05T04:57:24.499Z -- antenna%20house -- antenna%20house
item.description: An exploitable out-of-bounds write exists in the Microsoft Word document conversion functionality of the Antenna House Office Server Document Converter version V6.1 Pro MR2 for Linux64 (6,1,2018,0312). A crafted Microsoft Word (DOC) document can lead to an out-of-bounds write, resulting in remote code execution. This vulnerability occurs in the `vbputanld` method.
